hero.subtitle: Realistic and high-quality dolls for collectors and enthusiasts. Fast and secure delivery worldwide.

slider.quality_subtitle: Medical-grade silicone and hyper-realistic details for an unparalleled experience.
slider.team_subtitle: Our talented creators bring each doll to life with passion and expertise.
slider.eco_subtitle: Limited editions and unique pieces for discerning collectors.

features.title: Why Dolls-Store?
features.f1_text: Each doll is crafted with premium medical-grade silicone and hand-painted.
features.f2_text: Protective packaging and insured delivery worldwide.
features.f3_text: 30-day return policy and warranty on all our products.

process.title: How it works?
process.step1_text: Browse our collection and find the perfect doll.
process.step2_text: Add to cart and proceed to secure payment.
process.step3_text: Fast and careful delivery directly to your home.

footer.description: Creators of premium silicone dolls for collectors worldwide. Dolls-Store brings your dreams to life.

about.title: Silicone Doll Excellence
about.subtitle: The art of realistic dolls at its peak
about.description: Dolls-Store, European leader in creating realistic silicone dolls. Our mission is to create unique works of art that move and fascinate collectors.

materials.title: Materials & Quality
materials.content: We only use premium medical-grade silicone and non-toxic pigments. Every detail is hand-painted for unmatched realism.

craftsmanship.title: Craftsmanship & Passion
craftsmanship.content: Each doll is created by our expert artisans with meticulous attention to detail. A manufacturing process that guarantees the uniqueness of each piece.

collection.title: Exclusive Collections
collection.content: Limited editions created in collaboration with renowned artists. Each collection tells a unique story.

award.title: International Recognition
award.content: Awarded for the excellence of our creations, Dolls-Store is the reference in the world of premium collectible dolls.

success.title: It's done, {{name}}!
success.description: Your order for the doll <1>{{product}}</1> has been successfully validated.
success.contact: A Dolls-Store advisor will contact you shortly.
success.note: A payment receipt has been sent to your email address. Keep it safe for your order tracking.
